mapper.select: SELECT item_code,item_name,item_no,item_specification,item_type,item_category FROM ma_item WHERE NOT item_category = '원자재' AND company_code = #{company_code} ORDER BY item_category DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ma_bom_tree(company_code,ppitem_cd,sitem_cd,item_name,item_no, item_specification, item_qty, item_stock_unit, item_type, item_category) VALUES (#{company_code},#{ppitem_cd},#{bomItem.item_code},#{bomItem.item_name},#{bomItem.item_no},#{bomItem.item_specification},#{bomItem.item_qty},#{bomItem.item_stock_unit},#{bomItem.item_type},#{bomItem.item_category})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ma_bom_tree WHERE ppitem_cd = #{ppitem_cd} AND sitem_cd = #{bomItem.item_code} AND company_code = #{company_code}
